name: C:/Endless
description:
TRON inspired endless runner where you ride deeper into the game's code as the bots and camera try to stop you! 

I made this game as a project for my game design degree a couple years ago, it took me a few months and it still had some bad bugs in it and no menus. Always wanted to fix it up and actually publish it somewhere so this is as good a reason as any!

Hope you enjoy!

Collecting Blue Capsules gives you a BlueBuddy (Max 1) 

Yellow Discs let you reset the camera to normal

Green Cylinders let you deploy a light bridge for you to cross

CONTROLS:

Move left : A

Move right: D

Shoot Buddy: W

Reset Cam: Down Arrow

Activate Bridge: Up Arrow

Godmode: G

Pressing Escape while in god mode will reset.

If Buddy hits enemy, enemy is destroyed

If Buddy hits the red Boss Wall, player is randomly gifted an item or a point.
